title: It takes 6 people a total of 8 days to paint a wall. How long would it take 4 people to paint the same wall? - Quora

response.answer_text: So, assuming that they are painting at the same rate throughout the whole thing, six people will take one day to paint 1/8 of a wall. So, one person would paint 1/48 of this wall in one day, and four people would paint 4/48, or 1/12, in a day. Which means they would take 12 days to paint that wall, painting at the same rate as the six people painting.

Total work = 6 * 8 man days Therefore time taken by 4 men to complete the same work= T = 48 man days / 4 man = 12 days Chain rule can also be applied, More men means less days , and less men means more days Hence, Time taken by 4 men =T= (6/4)* 8 days = 12 days.
